statements: SELECT * FROM athletes_recovery_data;
SELECT athlete_id, sleep_quality FROM athletes_recovery_data WHERE hydration_level > 0.5;
SELECT athlete_id, muscle_soreness FROM athletes_recovery_data WHERE sleep_quality < 6;
SELECT athlete_id, hydration_level FROM athletes_recovery_data ORDER BY muscle_soreness DESC;
SELECT * FROM athletes_recovery_data WHERE sleep_quality > 7 AND hydration_level > 0.8;
SELECT athlete_id, sleep_quality, hydration_level, muscle_soreness FROM athletes_recovery_data;
SELECT athlete_id, sleep_quality, hydration_level FROM athletes_recovery_data WHERE muscle_soreness > 3;
SELECT AVG(sleep_quality) as avg_sleep_quality, AVG(hydration_level) as avg_hydration_level FROM athletes_recovery_data;
SELECT * FROM athletes_recovery_data WHERE hydration_level < 6 ORDER BY sleep_quality DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, muscle_soreness FROM athletes_recovery_data WHERE sleep_quality BETWEEN 7 AND 9;
SELECT * FROM athlete_recovery_data WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_id, sleep_quality, hydration_level FROM athlete_recovery_data WHERE muscle_soreness > 5;
SELECT athlete_id, hydration_level FROM athlete_recovery_data ORDER BY hydration_level DESC;
SELECT performance_date, performance_score FROM athlete_performance_data WHERE athlete_id = 2 ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, muscle_soreness FROM athlete_recovery_data WHERE sleep_quality BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM athlete_recovery_data WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT athlete_id, hydration_level, muscle_soreness FROM athlete_recovery_data WHERE sleep_quality > 7;
SELECT athlete_id, performance_score, performance_date FROM athlete_performance_data ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(sleep_quality), MAX(hydration_level), MIN(muscle_soreness) FROM athlete_recovery_data;
SELECT athlete_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM athlete_performance_data GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING avg_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, sport, age FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Basketball';
SELECT athlete_name, email FROM athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT athlete_name, phone_number FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Swimming' ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, age, sport FROM athletes WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM athletes
SELECT athlete_name, sport, age FROM athletes ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT athlete_name, sport, email FROM athletes WHERE age > 25
SELECT athlete_name, sport, age FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Running'
SELECT athlete_name, sport, email, phone_number FROM athletes WHERE age <= 30
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT name, age, team FROM athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM sleep_quality ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, date, sleep_score FROM sleep_quality WHERE sleep_score > 7;
SELECT athlete_id, date, soreness_level FROM muscle_soreness WHERE soreness_level >= 3;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT id, name, gender FROM athletes WHERE team = 'Team A';
SELECT athlete_id, date, hours_slept FROM sleep_quality ORDER BY hours_slept DESC;
SELECT AVG(hours_slept) AS average_hours_slept, athlete_id FROM sleep_quality GROUP BY athlete_id;

SELECT athletes.name, sleep_quality.hours_slept, hydration_levels.water_consumed FROM athletes JOIN sleep_quality ON athletes.id = sleep_quality.athlete_id JOIN hydration_levels ON athletes.id = hydration_levels.athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, age, weight FROM Athletes ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, height FROM Athletes WHERE weight > 70;
SELECT athlete_name, hydration_level FROM HydrationData WHERE water_intake < 2.0;
SELECT athlete_name, muscle_group, soreness_level FROM MuscleSorenessData WHERE soreness_level >= 5 ORDER BY soreness_level DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, age FROM Athletes WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY athlete_name ASC
SELECT athlete_name, weight, height FROM Athletes WHERE weight >= 70 AND height <= 180 ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT athlete_name, sleep_hours, sleep_quality FROM Athletes JOIN SleepData ON Athletes.athlete_id = SleepData.athlete_id WHERE sleep_hours >= 8 AND sleep_quality = 'Good' ORDER BY athlete_name

SELECT athlete_name, water_intake, hydration_level FROM Athletes JOIN HydrationData ON Athletes.athlete_id = HydrationData.athlete_id WHERE water_intake < 2.5 AND hydration_level = 'Hydrated' ORDER BY athlete_name DESC

SELECT athlete_name, muscle_group, soreness_level FROM Athletes JOIN MuscleSorenessData ON Athletes.athlete_id = MuscleSorenessData.athlete_id WHERE muscle_group = 'Legs' AND soreness_level >= 5 ORDER BY athlete_name
